description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Warfare Soundboard brings you one of the largest war soundboards on the market. You have the opportunity to mix and match your favorite sound effects into an awesome warfare soundtrack.
